title: Prime Property in Nuwara Eliya Close to Town for Sale
details:
Here is an opportunity to buy a prime piece of land very close to the town in the central hills in Nuwara Eliya.
Located only 200 meters away from the town this property comes with an old house with 6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms.
Ideally suited for a corporate client to build a private bungalow.

Land Extent :- 45 Perches

Selling Price :- LKR 85 Million

NO BROKERS PLEASE
